sqlMap.select: SELECT TIMEZN_CD, TIMEZN_CD || 'ì‹œ' AS TIMEZN_NM FROM RDIT.TB_FLOATING_POPULATION_0HOUR_FESTIVAL_ADCD GROUP BY TIMEZN_CD ORDER BY TIMEZN_CD
select orgn_nm, addr, tel_number from rdit.tb_happns_welfr_cntr order by tel_number

select admi_cd, adstrd_nm, (select distinct administzone_code from rdit.tn_wnty_adstrd_legaldong_list_231013 where substring(adstrd_code, 0, 9) = A.admi_cd) as administzone_code, sum(total) as total from rdit.tb_floating_population_0hour_festival_adcd A where timezn_cd between #startTime# and #endTime# group by admi_cd, adstrd_nm order by admi_cd
